com.duke0200.weapons.sticks

Class Halberd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.duke0200.weapons.Weapon
      • com.duke0200.weapons.axes.Axe
        • com.duke0200.weapons.sticks.Halberd

  • public class Halberd
extends Axe
    Halburd Class. Basically an axe with a longer handle (therefore more range) and slower attack speed.
    Since:
    0.4
    Author:
    The Duke

    • Constructor Detail

      • Halberd

        public Halberd(java.lang.String name,
       int att,
       int def,
       int rng,
       double spd)
        Custom Halberd Constructor. User details all mandatory values.
        Defaults minimum strength to 30 and number of hands to 2.
        Parameters:
        name - Display name used in GUIs
        att - Attack used in battles and factoring damage dealt in attacks
        def - Defense used in battles and factoring damage taken from opposing attacks
        rng - Range used in determining if opposing entity is in range of this weapon's attack radius
        spd - Attack Speed used in determining how fast the using entity can attack the opposing entity

      • Halberd

        public Halberd(java.lang.String name,
       int att,
       int def,
       int rng,
       double spd,
       int hands)
        Custom Halberd Constructor. User details all mandatory values and number of hands.
        Defaults minimum strength to 30.
        Parameters:
        name - Display name used in GUIs
        att - Attack used in battles and factoring damage dealt in attacks
        def - Defense used in battles and factoring damage taken from opposing attacks
        rng - Range used in determining if opposing entity is in range of this weapon's attack radius
        spd - Attack Speed used in determining how fast the using entity can attack the opposing entity
        hands - Number of Hands used to determine whether this lance is to be used with one or two hands

      • Halberd

        public Halberd(java.lang.String name,
       int att,
       int def,
       int rng,
       double spd,
       int hands,
       int min)
        Custom Halberd Constructor. User details all values.
        Parameters:
        name - Display name used in GUIs
        att - Attack used in battles and factoring damage dealt in attacks
        def - Defense used in battles and factoring damage taken from opposing attacks
        rng - Range used in determining if opposing entity is in range of this weapon's attack radius
        spd - Attack Speed used in determining how fast the using entity can attack the opposing entity
        hands - Number of Hands used to determine whether this lance is to be used with one or two hands
        min - Details minimum amount of strength that is required to use this lance to its full capabilities

      • Halberd

        public Halberd()
        Default Halberd Constructor. Makes an ordinary halberd.
